title: Asian Football Confederation
summary: The Asian Football Confederation (AFC; Arabic: الاتحاد الآسيوي لكرة القدم‎, romanized: Al-Ittiḥād Al-Assiyawī Likurat Al-Qadam) is one of the six confederations within FIFA and is the governing body of association football in Asia and Australia. It has 47 member countries, most of which are located in Asia.
